"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a874a563687275320000ec#post_55a874a563687275320000ec
His anger is misdirected. Instead of going after fiction, go after real problems. He's under this assumption that everyone can and will interpret fiction as reality, when in reality, it depends a lot. Most people I trust are able to make the split between reality and fantasy. It's only those fringe individuals who are either never went through proper parental discipline or are just f-ed themselves.
